word:
What has the rich blessing of God done for those who were humble and contrite in heart to receive it? Has the blessing been cherished? Have the receivers been showing forth the praises of Him who has called them out of darkness into His marvelous light? There are some who are already questioning the work that was so good, and that 
                                                                           142
should have been most highly appreciated. They are looking upon it as a certain species of fanaticism.
